original_text: The woman must wait for 35 days after the boy is born. All this time she must not touch anything that is holy. She must not go into the Tent of Meeting. After this time, she will become clean.
korean_text: 그 여인은 아직도 삼십삼 일을 지내야 산혈이 깨끗하리니 정결하게 되는 기한이 차기 전에는 성물을 만지지도 말며 성소에 들어가지도 말 것이며

sentences.original_text: The woman must wait for 35 days
All this time she must not touch
sentences.korean_translation: 이 모든 시간 동안 그녀는 만지면 안 됩니다

sentences.original_text: She must not go into the Tent of Meeting
